name: execute_transfer
body: let mut src = ctx . accounts . account_a . to_account_info () ;
let mut dst = ctx . accounts . account_b . to_account_info () ;
* * src . lamports . borrow_mut () = src . lamports () . checked_sub (amount) . unwrap () ;
* * dst . lamports . borrow_mut () = dst . lamports () . checked_add (amount) . unwrap () ;

fields.name: account_a
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: expecting TransferAccount but using UncheckedAccount"]

fields.name: account_b
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: expecting TransferAccount but using UncheckedAccount"]
